entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 8:06 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Flurries beginning in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 8:06 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
